```{r}
ES = read.csv('ES-1min.csv')
FT = read.csv('FT-1min.csv')
ES.tau = log(ES$Close)
Sigma.tau_ES = numeric(0)
FT.tau = log(FT$Close)
Sigma.tau_FT = numeric(0)
for (i in 1:10000)
{
  Sigma.tau_ES[i] = sd(diff(ES.tau,i))
  Sigma.tau_FT[i] = sd(diff(FT.tau,i))
  print(i)
}
# Log-Log
tau = 1:10000
Log.tau = log(tau)
Log.Sigma.tau_ES = log(Sigma.tau_ES)
Log.Sigma.tau_FT = log(Sigma.tau_FT)
# PLOT
plot(tau,Sigma.tau_ES)
plot(tau,Sigma.tau_FT)
plot(Log.tau,Log.Sigma.tau_ES)
plot(Log.tau,Log.Sigma.tau_FT)
#Statistical Summary
df = cbind(Log.tau,Log.Sigma.tau_ES,Log.Sigma.tau_FT)
df = data.frame(df)
lm_ES = lm(Log.Sigma.tau_ES ~ Log.tau, data = df)
summary(lm_ES)
lm_FT = lm(Log.Sigma.tau_FT ~ Log.tau, data =df)
summary(lm_FT)
```
